thread.title: Beautiful well located hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful well located hotel - Review of River Palace Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: pippap36
title: Beautiful well located hotel
text:
This was our 2nd visit, the last one being 10 years ago... it was just as fantastic as it was then!
We brought my mum who was 80 on the day we arrived and it was also our 20th wedding anniversary trip, we had a bottle of wine in both rooms which was lovely as well as sweets!
The hotel itself is so pretty, and really close to the centre of Rome with all its wonderful sites... the breakfast is really good with loads of choice and best of all the staff are fabulous.. especially at reception and especially the lovely, smiley Sergio... thanks for looking after us and making my Mothers first trip to Rome so special!!
See all photos
